meanings.sent1: The cells were autolyzing, breaking down on their own.
meanings.sent2: The bacteria were autolyzing in the petri dish.
meanings.sent3: The bread dough seemed to be autolyzing itself, rising and falling.
meanings.sent4: As the leaves decayed, they appeared to be autolyzing into the earth.
meanings.sent5: The candle slowly autolyzing, melting away into a pool of wax.

meanings.definition: The process by which cells self-destruct.
meanings.sent1: Autolyzing can be a natural part of the cell's life cycle.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the autolyzing of the cancer cells.
meanings.sent3: The autolyzing of the old cells made room for new growth.
meanings.sent4: The autolyzing of the damaged cells helped the body heal.
meanings.sent5: The process of autolyzing is crucial for maintaining cell balance.
